description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              We are looking for a responsible Assistant to CEO to perform clerical tasks in a well-organized and timely way. You will need to act proactively while being trained to become a leader and critical thinker, ready to solve problems before they become obstacles.
              

              Assistant to CEO are well-versed in performance and operations management and competent in assuming delegated duties. The goal is to help CEO attain objectives of productivity and employee satisfaction.
              

              It's a singular chance for anyone who wants to have an overview of how to run a business.
              

              Maximize the productivity of CEO:
              
              - Completes a broad variety of administrative tasks for CEO including: managing an extremely active calendar of appointments; arranging complex and detailed travel plans, itineraries, and agendas; and compiling documents for travel-related meetings.
              
              - Provides a bridge for smooth communication between CEO and internal departments; demonstrating leadership to maintain credibility, support with leader management.
              
              - Screen contracts & other documents, brief to CEO and coordinate with related departments.
              
              - Produce reports, presentations and briefs when necessary.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Please carefully read our requirements as below to ensure your suitability before applying your CVs. Thank you.
              

              Reliable & Trustworthy
              
              - Discipline, always ontime, keeping promise.
              
              - Discreet. Great communicator for the right things but know how to keep confidential matters.
              
              - Work hard and willing to work whenever required Sunday, holiday.
              
              - Know how to write memo, organize meeting, follow up .
              
              - Good project management skill, good planner.
              
              - Great Communication skill
              
              - Perfect English & Mandarin.
              
              - Know how to do a great presentation (powerpoint advanced user). Have a good eye for design/visual.
              

              Others
              
              - Know how to do basic analysis (excel)
              
              - Male is preferred due to extensive working conditions and a lot of travel may be required.
              
              - Ex or current Tikiers are highly preferred. If not then exposure in e-commerce/retail is also a plus.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
